name: Monkey Bike Race Ball
description:
Everyone knows that monkeys like to play hard - and these monkeys like to bike their way through the jungle!

Monkey Bike Race Ball is a simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help your monkey collect bananas and avoid the dangers of the dense jungle!

Think you got the skills to stay up on your sweet ride? The game will start moving faster and faster, so watch out for those obstacles!

Collect enough banans and you can upgrade your ride to a dirt bike or street bike!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect bananas to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Monkey Bike Race Ball right now!
